Articles.Content:
I'm on here.

A lot.

At some point I wanted to reply to a thread. It ended up being thrown out of context because it wasn't approved by the mods in time (I feel it, yo. No complaints here.) But anyway, yeah. Hi. I kind of suck at playing ksp. But I have FUN sucking at it. And that's about it.

ALSO

How in all of bad GUI's do I actually add a profile picture? I feel sketchy. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

Hi!, and welcome.

Nice to see you introduce yourself.

You can add an avatar after some number of posts (I think it's 5)

Happy landings!
Welcome in from the cold, lurker. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
